alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 6:28PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Tishomingo, northern Alcorn, southeastern McNairy and southwestern Hardin Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 627 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Theo, or near Corinth, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Iuka, J P Coleman State Park, Pickwick Landing State Park, Burnsville, Glen, Pickwick Dam, Pineflat, Theo, Leedy, Farmington, Eastview, Michie, Guys, Ramer, Kossuth, Oldham, Doskie, Strickland and Blythe Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi...and west Tennessee.
